text:
The students in Mr. Bernoski’s class play several rounds of the game. At one point in a game, the scores are as follows:

Super Brains: –300

Rocket Scientists: 150

Know-It-Alls: –500

  • Which team has the highest score? The lowest score? Explain why.
  • Use equations (number sentences) to describe at least two ways that each team reached their score.
  • Find the difference in points for each pair of teams. How is this information useful to each team?
